CriticalExtentCodelist-to-allergy-intolerance-criticality (http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/snomed/ConceptMap/CriticalExtentCodelist-to-allergy-intolerance-criticality)

Mapping from http://decor.nictiz.nl/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.2.8.2.4--20150401000000 to http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-criticality

ACTIVE. Published on Jan 4, 2017 9:27:28 AM by Nictiz (Nictiz: info@nictiz.nl). CC0

Maps the HCIM AllergyIntolerance release 2015 terminology for AllergyCriticalExtent to the FHIR STU3 terminology

name: CriticalExtentCodelist-to-allergy-intolerance-criticality
title: HCIM CriticalExtentCodelist to allergy-intolerance-criticality
description: Maps the HCIM AllergyIntolerance release 2015 terminology for AllergyCriticalExtent to the FHIR STU3 terminology
purpose: To aid in mapping from ZIB AllergyIntolerance value set MateVanKritiekZijnCodelijst to FHIR STU3 AllergyIntolerance criticality
